enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Co-Chairs Fatu Gaye (Gambia) and Jean-Pascal van Ypersele (Belgium) convened this contact group Monday afternoon to discuss the Co-Chairs conclusions and the draft decision on the work programme.
The group bracketed all text related to financial resources and requests to the SBI to provide additional guidance to the financial mechanisms.
Delegates could not agree to language making reference to 'developing countries' or 'non-Annex I Parties.
' Co-Chair van Ypersele requested Parties to continue meeting informally on the remaining elements of the work programme.
